text: Edge of Darkness is a 2010 drama thriller movie. It is about a detective who gets involved with the murder of his political activist daughter and gets caught up in conspiracy. The movie stars Mel Gibson. It was released in January 2010 in the United Kingdom and the United States. The reviews for this were mixed. It earned $81 million in the box office. ==References== Category:2010 drama thriller movies Category:American drama thriller movies Category:British thriller movies Category:2010s British drama movies Category:2010s English-language movies Category:Political movies Category:Movies about conspiracy theories
title: Edge of Darkness (2010 movie)
